attributes.description:
From the deep roar of the fine-tuned V-8 engine to dynamics engineered by BMW M, the 2022 BMW M850i xDrive Coupe is designed to satisfy the most driven thrill-seekers.

All vehicles quality checked by our highly qualified BMW technicians, to ensure your vehicle is as good as new. 
Contact one of our very friendly and highly professional sales staff members to tailor your deal on this vehicle today! 
Finance can be arranged. 
Test drives and trade ins welcome!

attributes.description:
Here are some of what the team at Renault Pinetown offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged.

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager JP Thomas and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information, or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Select Vanderbijlpark.

attributes.description:
Experience big thinking in the small details with the Atos. It’s low in fuel consumption and big on safety, but nothing compares to seeing, driving and feeling it all for yourself. It’s the small big things that make the biggest difference.
On-road entertainment is the name of the game and getting an Atos is how you play it right. The Atos comes standard with Infotainment with Apple Carplay, so you can access your playlists from all music streaming apps, chat hands-free on WhatsApp and explore your city using your favourite navigation app.
The Atos radiates beauty from both inside and out with full-size wheel covers and a high mounted stop lamp. Express your persona and find the colour that compliments your style from polar white to fiery red.


Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
